# we-checkbox-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                            | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`    | Name that identify this checkbox group | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                   | Description                                                                                                                         | Type               |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `checkboxGroupCallback` | Event triggered when a checkbox inside change its state that returning the name of checkbox group and the value of checkbox changed | `CustomEvent<any>` |
